arcwelder_enable.label: Arc Welder
arcwelder_enable.description: Convert multiple G0/G1 arc segments into G2/G3 arc commands using Arc Welder.

arcwelder_maximum_radius.label: Maximum Arc Radius
arcwelder_maximum_radius.description: The maximum radius of any arc in mm.

arcwelder_tolerance.label: Tolerance
arcwelder_tolerance.description: This is the maximum allowable difference between the arc path and the original toolpath.

arcwelder_resolution.label: Resolution
arcwelder_resolution.description: The resolution in mm of the of the output.  Determines the maximum tool path deviation allowed during conversion.
